@Eskimo14: did you place the crack in the right directories? have you since then updated the game to 1.0.0.1? if you have updated it, you must uninstall and reinstall because the crack is useless at 1.0.0.1. if you havent, check if you put in the crack correctly or try running as administrator, that sometimes helps.
